name: The Quest (itch) (Dual Executive Swivel)
description:
The Quest is a fantasy world exploration game for hospitalised children created as our entry for the 2015 TasJam Health competition.

In The Quest children can roam around the world moving between different rooms, collecting objects, talking to people, and enjoying the exploration of the world.

For a WebGL build see:http://dev.secretlab.com.au/tasjam2015health
